channel.title: [317]Opening Doors[317]
channel.description: Hi i was wondering how to open a door on a delta 317 base. I want to click on the door and change it so it is open. Can anyone help? thankyou.

item.title: [317]Opening Doors[317]
item.dc:creator: @Fall Fall
item.description:
@Fall wrote:

I Vain I:

Are you using spaces, or tabs?

tabs

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Opening Doors[317]
item.dc:creator: @Fall Fall
item.description:
@Fall wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]door = 3098 3107 3014 0 -1 -1 1 0

Try that.

If not, mess with the FaceO, FaceC, and Face.[/quote]

no it still didnt work, but thanks for trying.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Opening Doors[317]
item.dc:creator: @Fall Fall
item.description:
@Fall wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]You didn’t add them right then.

Make sure you’re using the correct door ID, and make sure you’re at the right coordinates.[/quote]

I am pretty sure i did if the id is 3014 because i get this error:

Initiating Start Methods.
[Client-1-Owner joe]: Character Loaded Sucessfully  [Has powers, lag: 16 ms]
[Client-1-Owner joe]: serverobjs size 0
[Client-1-Owner joe]: atObject: 3098,3107 objectID: 3014

This is in the run.bat

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Opening Doors[317]
item.dc:creator: @Fall Fall
item.description:
@Fall wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Here are some door examples, with the explanation.:

//X,Y IS WHERE DOOR IS
//Door state 0 = closed 1 = open.
//FACE: 0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH
//ADDED 7 door as a example -bakatool
//FACE = FACE BEGIN WITH 
//FACEOPEN = FACE OPENED DOOR  
//FACECLOSED = FACE CLOSED DOOR
//HEIGHT 0 = GROUND LVL, 1 IS UP LADDER, 2 IS UP UP LADDER, 3 = UNDERGROUND I THINK.

//     XCoord	YCoord	Id	FaceO	FaceC	Face	State	Height
door = 2726	3368	1533	-2	-3	-3	1	0
door = 2594	3102	1530	-2	-3	-3	1	0
door = 2603	3082	1533	-2	-1	-1	1	0
door = 2601	9482	2559	-2	-1	-1	1	0
door = 2597	3087	1600	-1	0	0	1	0
door = 2597	3088	1601	-3	0	0	1	0
door = 2584	3088	1600	-3	-2	-2	1	0
door = 2584	3087	1601	-1	-2	-2	1	0
door = 2593	9490	2154	-2	-1	-1	1	0
door = 2592	9490	2155	0	-1	-1	1	0
door = 3320	3467	1598	-1	0	0	1	0
door = 3320	3468	1599	-3	0	0	1	0
door = 3405	9895	3444	-2	-3	-3	1	0
door = 3431	9897	3445	-3	-2	-2	1	0
door = 3312	3234	3197	-3	-2	-2	1	0
door = 2816	3438	1530	-1	-2	-2	1	0
door = 3426	3555	10527	-3	-2	-3	1	1
door = 3445	3554	5126	-3	-2	-3	1	1

Face0 is the direction it faces when it’s open.
FaceC is the direction it faces when it’s closed.
Face is the direction it faces upon login.
(0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH)[/quote]

when i still click it, it doesnt close/open

Read full topic
